DataBase.Opration

Class PlayList

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataBase.Opration.PlaylistInfoList
      • DataBase.Opration.PlayList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Playable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlaylistOperation

    public class PlayList
extends PlaylistInfoList
implements Playable
    The Playlist class contains fields, describing the the id and name of the playlist. The class also provides useful functionality like nameToId and addPlaylist, which is used throughout the project.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayList() 
      PlayList(int playListID)
      Constructs a playlist with a given id
      PlayList(int playListID, java.lang.String playListName)
      Constructs a playlist with a given playlist id and name
      PlayList(java.lang.String playListName)
      Constructs a playlist object with a given name, and then queries the database for the corresponding id.

      • editPlayListName

        public boolean editPlayListName(java.lang.String oldName,
                                java.lang.String newName)
        This method is used to the name of a playlist. The method will first perform a check in the database to determine if the new name of the playlist already exists. If not the new name will be updated in the database.
        Parameters:
        oldName - old name of the playlist
        newName - new name
        Returns:
        true if success, false if fail
